code: @Test public void testSendingMessageGetsDelayed() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint mock = getMockEndpoint("mock:result").     mock.expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             context.setTracing(true).             from("direct:start").delay(1000).to("mock:foo").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
